name: Remove Binary Prefix and parse DevAddr
Prepare for influx
Match LoRaWAN Network
func:
// Filter if no received packet (e.g. status)
if (!msg.payload.rxpk) {
    return;
}

// From https://www.thethingsnetwork.org/docs/lorawan/prefix-assignments.html
// as of 2020-03-03

devaddr_int = parseInt(msg.payload.rxpk[0].DevAddr,16);
msg.network = networks.find(net => (parseInt(net.range_start,16) <= devaddr_int && parseInt(net.range_end,16) >= devaddr_int));
return msg;
